amendment.description: To clarify provisions relating to waivers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4104 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4104 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S7527; text: CR S7527) To clarify provisions relating to waivers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4104 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Collins.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4104 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
